info.headline: Flood Warning issued July 10 at 11:52AM EDT until July 12 at 11:00PM EDT by NWS Albany
info.description: ...FLOOD WARNING IN EFFECT FROM THIS EVENING TO LATE WEDNESDAY EVENING... * WHAT...Minor flooding is forecast. * WHERE...Housatonic River At Falls Village. * WHEN...From this evening to late Wednesday evening. * IMPACTS...At 7 feet, the park above Falls Village Dam begins to flood, and water reaches the fields of White Hollow Farms near Limerock Road, and is at the edge of the Housatonic Valley Regional High School fields. * ADDITIONAL DETAILS... - At 11:15 AM EDT Monday the stage was 6.2 feet. - Forecast...The river is expected to rise above flood stage late this evening to a crest of 7.3 feet early tomorrow afternoon. It will then fall below flood stage Wednesday afternoon. - Flood stage is 7 feet. - Flood History...This crest compares to a previous crest of 7.4 feet on 04/16/2001. - http://www.weather.gov/safety/flood && Housatonic River Falls Village Flood Stage: 7.0 Observed Stage at Mon 11 am: 6.2 Forecast: Mon 2 pm 6.6 Mon 8 pm 6.9 Tue 2 am 7.1 Tue 8 am 7.2 Tue 2 pm 7.3 Tue 8 pm 7.3 Wed 2 am 7.3 Wed 8 am 7.2 Wed 2 pm 7.1 Wed 8 pm 6.9 Thu 2 am 6.7 Thu 8 am 6.5 &&
